pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Caikit Text Generation Inference Service (TGIS) BackendThis project provides a Caikit module backend that manages models run in TGIS## ConfigurationSample configuration using the `MULTI` finder and a remote `TGIS` backend):```yamlruntime: library: caikit_nlp local_models_dir: /path/to/models lazy_load_local_models: truemodel_management: finders: default: type: MULTI config: finder_priority: - local - tgis-auto initializers: default: type: LOCAL config: backend_priority: - type: TGIS config: connection: hostname: "localhost:8033" test_connections: true connect_timeout: 30log: formatter: pretty```
